titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow any employer maintaining a defined benefit plan that is not a governmental plan to treat employee contributions as pretax employer contributions if picked up by the employer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/3/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the treatment of employee contributions as pretax employer contributions.
